key_dates.description: First turning point date of August (+/- 1 day).
Second turning point. Significant for potential volatility.
Third turning point. Within volatility window Aug 13-18.
Fourth turning point. Aligns with daily cycle.
Fifth turning point. Potential trend reversal.

seasonal: August slightly negative seasonally. September is worst month statistically. MACD negative divergence persists on weekly. All three trends still upward.

statistics.description: Index closed higher on Aug 19 vs Aug 9 in ~67% of 30 years.

insights: Cyclical windows from July (84-year global wars, 45-year Iran, 250-year empires) continue through August.
90/144-year cycles point to identity/migration upheaval. Gold, oil, crypto signal geopolitical movement.
Aug cycle depth: Strong monthly cycles on dollar/euro. Weekly on oil (Aug 18-22). Dense daily points for S&P/Gold (Aug 13-18).
Critical windows: Aug 4-6 and Aug 28-Sep 1 are high-concentration cycle zones.
Gann: Time more important than price, but price must confirm the turn.
Dominant trend positive. 2025 expected positive per annual review.
CNN Fear and Greed at 61 (end July), declining from 66.
RSP and Dow not breaking highs - rally led by few mega-caps.
Aug 15 strongest date in volatility window. Aug 28 significant for reversal.
Tighten stops, avoid new longs without correction, avoid leveraged ETFs.
Trade price+time. Dates are anchors for cyclical confirmation.

support.description: Below this at month end = fundamental change.

technical.indicators: V-shaped recovery on weekly. RSP double-top, Dow lagging. MACD persistent negative divergence. Fib 38.2% at 5,823. N-pattern on weekly per Dow theory. Fear/Greed at 61.

summary: August 2025 slightly negative seasonally for S&P500 with five turning points (Aug 1, 14, 18, 25, 28). Concentrated volatility expected Aug 13-18. Trend positive but RSP/Dow lagging. MACD divergence present. September worst month approaching.
previous_month_review: July: 5 turning dates. 03.07=high of June. 10-11.07 double cycle=high then mild decline. 16.07=low, best cycle +2.5%. 23-24.07=continuation. 31.07=high.
risk_notes: August slightly negative; September worst month statistically.
Volatility Aug 13-18 with S&P/Gold daily cycles converging.
RSP/Dow not breaking highs - narrow mega-cap rally.
Below 5,961 at month end = fundamental change.
Wait for chart confirmation on dates.
